verses.verse: And it came to pass in the seventh<WH7637> year<WH8141>, in the fifth<WH2549> month<WH6218>, the tenth day of the month<WH2320>, that certain<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of the Lord<WH3068>, and sat<WH3427> before me<WH6440>.
